summary: Align exchange receiver payloads with published schemas

directives.details: Modify exchange_receiver.py so the acknowledgement payload matches signal-ack@1.0 (ack_id, referenced_id, sender, receiver, timestamp_sent, status, optional notes).
Modify exchange_receiver.py so the report payload matches field-report@1.0 (report_id, origin, relates_to, timestamp_submitted, status, summary, optional metrics/artifacts).
Warn if an order is past expires_at and log a concise summary when moving the order to dispatched/.
Run python tools/schema_validator.py against the generated ack and report payloads before committing.
